replies.body:
Can you give me a bit more details on where these crashes happen? Also, if you saw any specific error messages when it happened, let me know what they said.

I can't offer you compensation for this, but we can work together to find a permanent solution.

Well, thats fine.
Now I find the way to solve it (probably)
I need to repair the Client every single time (or 2, just a few)
even sometimes I try to change the UserKernel but It still need to repair,
so now I just try to keep it, as well as I can
But i'll close it when I go to work,
so I might need to repair it once to twice per day,
it doesn't make lot of sense
just feel weird, Hope u guys can fix it soon :)

Since you have to repair so often, you may need to just complete a clean reinstallation of League to clear all corruptions for good. I recommend grabbing our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to do this. Simply launch the app, check the boxes for *reinstall* and *clean uninstall*, then launch the game after the reinstall completes to finish patching.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

That become well in these 2 days,
I did use the Hextach repair Tool, and uninstalled it already,
and it was crash still,
but it's fine now.

btw, Me and my friends are all lagging in these dew day, is that servers problem?
Can you give me a bit more details? *Lag* is often used to describe many different issues, so with more info, I'll understand what's going on.
